onboarding.title: ğŸ® Welcome to the TurvallisuusMestari game!
description: This game is designed to support the safety orientation of university students in a fun and accessible way. By playing, you will learn how to act responsibly, identify risks, and improve safety in your own study environment.

onboarding.title: ğŸŒ Worlds and Stages
description: The game consists of worlds which deal with safety themes. Each world contains seven (7) stages.

onboarding.title: ğŸ“‹ How does the game work?
description: ğŸ‘‰ Each stage includes a short theory section, followed by four multiple-choice questions.
ğŸ‘‰ Each question has four answers to choose from, but only one is correct.
ğŸ‘‰ Answer all four questions correctly to advance to the next stage. You can play the questions as many times as you want until you get them all right.
ğŸ‘‰ You will receive 1 point for each question you answer correctly. The game also measures the time it takes you to answer the questions.

onboarding.title: ğŸ…  Award
description: Once you have successfully completed all stages of the world, you will receive a digital badge showing that you have mastered the world's safety themes.

onboarding.title: ğŸ’¡ Tip
description: Take learning seriously but play with a relaxed attitude. This game helps you practice things that are very useful in real life.

onboarding.title: Are you ready?
description: Start playing and test your safety skills!

worlds.title: Worlds
worlds.explanation: Each World contains several Quizzes that you can beat to advance in the game!
worlds.clearEachQuiz: Can you beat every Quiz in this World?
